name: V-TACSmartLight
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen light”
”Alexa, turn off kitchen light”
”Alexa, dim livingroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
V-TAC Smart Light allows you to control different types of smart devices via voice command, such as lamps, vacuum cleaner, universal IR remote, and curtain motor. 
Make your home smart with V-TAC Smart Light devices.

To Start controlling your V-TAC Smart Light devices with Amazon Alexa app, please follow the below steps:

(1). Download & Install "V-TAC Smart Light" app from android or ios app store;
(2). Register V-TAC Smart Light account(If you already have an existing account, please proceed to logging in).
(3). Make sure you have a V-TAC Smart Light device.
(4). Pair the device to your V-TAC Smart Light app and rename the device as preffered.
(5). Download & Install Amazon "Alexa" app from android or ios store and register.
(6). Configure Alexa enabled device with "Alexa" app;
(7). Search "V-TAC Smart Light" skill on "Alexa" app;
(8). Click Enable skill of "V-TAC Smart Light, and you'll be navigated to V-TAC Smart Light login page;
(9). Input your V-TAC Smart Light account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page;
(10). You have now successfully connected Alexa app with V-TAC Smart Light Device

Now, you can control your smart device using voice commands on Alexa. Below are a few commands you can use.

“Alexa, turn on kitchen light"
“Alexa, turn off kitchen light"
“Alexa, dim livingroom light"
“Alexa, brighten livingroom light"
